text: There are reports that Taylor Swiftis trying to rekindle her relationship with ex - boyfriend Jake Gyllenhaal. OK! Magazine is reporting that the ` ` Wildest Dreams'' singer has been contacting her ex ever since he has been in New York City starring in the Broadway show called Sunday in the Park With George. The tabloid is reporting that a source is saying that Taylor is the one reaching out to the actor since she feels she is now more mature than she was when they dated back in 2010. The source said, “ Taylor was so young when they dated, she wasn ’ t ready for a serious relationship, but now she ’ s showing Jake how much she ’ s matured. She ’ s excited to see where things go. ” In 2015, a rumor swirled around saying that the stars were in
